candidates.name: Maxine Moana-Tuwhangai
candidates.why_elect: I offer a range of skills that can support the workings of the council. I'm a chartered accountant and an accredited environmental commissioner. I have approximately 17 years of notable governance experience and am familiar with council processes. I believe I have integrity and listen. I consider myself 'work ready.'
candidates.why_stand: Huntly is on the verge of exciting changes. I'm standing to be part of that change and to made a positive contribution to the community. Supporting my husband's home town also means supporting our families. I live in the adjacent council ward but if elected will fully commit to Huntly.

candidates.name: Bill Rosoman
candidates.why_elect: I have a long history of being involved in communities and involved in local body politics. I belong to several community groups and try to help the community get bigger and better and Huntly to be a great place to live.
candidates.why_stand: I believe if we work together as a community and get the public much more involved in community affairs we can make Huntly and District a better place to live and work. We also need to make the council much more transparent and accountable.
